review: Works awesome, we love love our google chromecast!
author: chelsro

review: Does its job fairly well. Some small hiccups from time to time. Wish it did MORE. But it works and makes your dumb TV's a bit smarter.
author: B. Bird "~Bird"

review: Worst customer service ever! A software update tot he product causes your device to stop working and there is nothing Google is willing to do about this if your Chromecast is out of warranty.
author: Madeline Turnquist

review: 3rd chromecast, easy setup, quick delivery.  now we can cast netflix with subtitles
author: east bay barry

review: Excellent experience! All according to the agreement. Impeccable compliance deadlines. Thank you very much!
author: Seba_C23

review: Works well for what it is.  Lacks a lot of the features that Fire TV Stick has.  However, it has a very simple and elegant design and unique "casting" functionality.
author: Nate

review: Wasn't compatible with my comcast router.  Bought a Roku 3 and it works great.
author: Albert

review: great item, I waited awhile to finally purchase one, very happy
author: Philip Badome
